DOC.HEADLINE: POETRY SERIES DEBUTS WITH ' SUPER SATURDAY '
DOC.TEXT: Global Arts Productions will begin its 1994 poetry and spoken word series Saturday with " Super Saturday -- The Super Bowl of Spoken Word , " a benefit for the St . Joseph ' s Center in Venice.Performers will include Paul Krassner , Luis Alfaro , Danny Peck and authors Hubert Selby Jr . and Danny Sugarman . The " Super Saturday " performance will take_place at 7 p.m. at the On the Waterfront Cafe , located at 205 Ocean Front Walk , Venice . Tickets are $ 12 and include a $ 2 coupon redeemable for drinks or food . Information : ( 310 ) 588-8630 .
